questions_and_notes: Shouldn't this just be the negative of hflso-Omon?  Shouldn't we just define variable similar to hfls (i.e., a positive version of hflso), and eliminate this row and row hflso-Omon?  Correct cell_methods to indicate time mean also is only for ice_free_sea
cell_methods: area: mean where ice_free_sea over sea time: mean
long_name: Temperature Flux Due to Evaporation Expressed as Heat Flux out of Sea Water
comment: This is defined as "where ice_free_sea over sea"
